testsuite.name: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And I enable Privacy Policy Required with the dummy URL
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Given I refresh the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And I accept the privacy policy if necessary
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Given I open the Create User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I enter the valid information for the user poole
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then the user poole is created
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I click the Register Users menu item
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And I search for user poole
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And I select the user "poole" in the list of users to add
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And I click the Register button on the Register Users page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then The users were successfully registered in the class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Given I log out
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the Maple TA login page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Maple TA login page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I enter valid credentials for user poole
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Privacy Policy page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I directly open module in class id 1 with assignment class id 1
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am on the Privacy Policy page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: And The Accept Privacy Policy button is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: When I accept the Privacy Policy
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: Then I am in module "Student Readiness Test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Access a legacy page when the privacy policy is required.

Log in as the new user. ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mI log out?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.logOut()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the Maple TA login page?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.navigateToLoginPage()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Maple TA login page?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.assertLoginPage()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid credentials for user ?[0m?[32m?[1mbowman?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.enterValidCredentials(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Privacy Policy page?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.assertPrivacyPolicyPage()?[0m # Directly navigte to gradebook ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the Privacy Policy page with redirect to ?[0m?[32m?[1m/1/gradebook?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.navigateToPrivacyPolicyPage(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Privacy Policy page?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.assertPrivacyPolicyPage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mThe Accept Privacy Policy button is visible?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.assertAcceptButtonVisible()?[0m # Rejecting the policy immediately logs you out. ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI reject the Privacy Policy?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.clickRejectButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Maple TA login page?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.assertLoginPage()?[0m # After logging in we should immediately be taken to privacy policy page. ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid credentials for user ?[0m?[32m?[1mbowman?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.enterValidCredentials(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Privacy Policy page?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.assertPrivacyPolicyPage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mThe Accept Privacy Policy button is visible?[0m ?[90m# PrivacyPolicySteps.assertAcceptButtonVisible()?[0m #
